### Tender Announcement

**Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)**

**Project Title:** Responsive Maintenance Services for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) at Cold Lake, Alberta

**Procurement Reference Number:** WS4197765731

**Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, November 29, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Amendment Notice:** Due to an error in the publishing system, the original closing time was incorrect. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Canada Buys posting closing time. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by November 29, 2023, at 14:00 EST.

**Project Overview:**

This Request for Standing Offer (RSO) invites qualified contractors to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio in accordance with the Statement of Work (Annex A).

**Services Required:**

* Maintenance and repair services for various systems, including:
	+ Flooring
	+ Heating and ventilation and air circulation
	+ Plumbing system maintenance or repair
	+ Landscaping services
	+ Snow removal services
	+ Residential painting services
	+ Electrical system services
	+ Carpentry services
	+ Roofing services
	+ Hazardous material decontamination
	+ Cleaning and janitorial services
	+ Hazardous waste disposal
	+ Facilities management

**Notices:**

* An optional teleconference will be held on November 1, 2023, at 13:00 pm EDT in English and on November 2, 2023, at 13:00 pm EDT in French. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend by October 30, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.

**Key Information:**

* Solicitation method: Competitive – Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Procurement category: Service (SRV)
* Regions of opportunity: None
* Regions of delivery: Cold Lake, Alberta
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-user entities: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact Information:**

* Christine Seguin, Contracting Authority
* Phone: Not available
* Email: [christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
